General.Name: World Flex PCL
General.Description: World Flex Public Company Limited manufactures and sells latex thread products for the textile industry. The company offers rubber threads coated with talcum and polymer. Its products are used in various applications, such as sock tops, panty hose tops, orthopedic knit sockings, hosiery, light ribbons, alimentary and medical nettings, loom fabrics and warps, woofs, raschel fabrics, braids, laces, cords, and belts for furniture. It operates in Thailand, the People's Republic of China, Bangladesh, Indonesia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. World Flex Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Rubber Latex Group Public Company Limited.
